assetRequirements.purpose: main visual to capture attention and convey the essence of Thailand in autumn
assetRequirements.content_context: showcasing sunny beaches, fresh fruits, and cultural festivals in Thailand during autumn

assetRequirements.purpose: highlighting the beauty and attractions of Thailand
assetRequirements.content_context: featuring iconic landmarks and serene beach scenes in Thailand

usageInstructions.placement: Place according to campaign layout requirements
usageInstructions.context: Use in context of: Проведите осень в солнечном Тайланде с Kupibilet!. Ensure asset aligns with brand guidelines and campaign messaging.
usageInstructions.responsiveBehavior: Scale proportionally for mobile devices. Ensure minimum readable size on small screens.
usageInstructions.accessibilityRequirements: Ensure alt text is provided: "AI-selected These promotional icons will highlight special offers and discounts, guiding users through the booking process and encouraging social media sharing.". Alt text should be descriptive and convey the image's purpose in the email context.
usageInstructions.fallbackStrategy: If image fails to load, display alt text with appropriate background color
